page_content:
43
• The only seven-time winner of the American 
Trucking Associations’ President’s Trophy (1984, 
1989, 1993, 1998, 2003, 2010 and 2014)  
• Nine-time winner of the American Trucking 
Associations’ Excellence in Security Award (2001, 
2004, 2005, 2007, 2009, 2011, 2015, 2016 and 2019)   
• The only eight-time winner of the American 
Trucking Associations’ Excellence in Claims & Loss 
Prevention Award (2001, 2002, 2005, 2008, 2009, 
2012, 2017 and 2019)     
• 74% of field employees earned company awards for 
safety in 2020  Safety 
Awards
